document.full_text: rebels beat a rapid retreat east on wednesday, ceding land and a series of oil towns as quickly as they had taken them after muammar gaddafi's forces unleashed rockets and artillery on lightly armed rebel forces.
document.title: libya rebels, under fire, beat rapid retreat east
lines_and_colors: rebels beat a rapid retreat east on wednesday, ceding land and a series of oil towns as quickly as they had taken them after muammar gaddafi's forces unleashed rockets and artillery on lightly armed rebel forces.
